meta.description: Context Sensitive Help for the table "tx_devnullevents_event"

languageKey.label: Title of the event
A title for the event which is used as header.
Short description event
A short description for the event.
Description for the event
A reference to a predefined text. Points to a record of type tx_devnullevents_text.
Title of the event
A title for the event which is used as header.
The location of the event
A reference to a predefined location. Points to a record of type tx_partner_main.
The organizer of the event
A reference to a predefined legal entity. Points to a record of type tx_partner_main.
The instructors/trainers for the event
A reference to predefined persons. Points to records of type tx_partner_main.
Categories of the event
Categories the event belongs to.
Date/times of the event
Dates and times the event is taking place.
Backgroundcolor in calendar view
Backgroundcolor for the event in the calendar view. Can be overridden for each schedule in the list of schedules
Textcolor in calendar view
Textcolor for the event in the calendar view. Can be overridden for each schedule in the list of schedules
